title: Can Rose hold lead? Can Rory bounce back? Friday storylines at Augusta
content: A packed leaderboard includes Scottie Scheffler, who is searching for his third green jacket in four years.

title: Sources: Iamaleava no-shows Vols amid NIL talk
content: Quarterback Nico Iamaleava did not attend Tennessee's spring practice Friday amid ongoing NIL negotiations, sources told ESPN.

title: QB Flacco rejoining Browns on one-year contract
content: Joe Flacco is returning to Cleveland, where he won the NFL's Comeback Player of the Year award in 2023.

title: Source: Pitre, Texans agree to 3-year, $39M deal
content: Nickel cornerback Jalen Pitre and the Houston Texans have agreed to a three-year, $39 million contract extension with $30 million guaranteed, a source told ESPN.

title: Ja doing grenade celebration until it's 'a problem'
content: Grizzlies star Ja Morant, recently fined for mimicking pointing a long gun after a 3-pointer, said mimicking a grenade toss was "my celebration now until somebody else has a problem with it, and I'll find another one."

title: Fever, Clark vs. Sky, Reese top WNBA Rivals Wk.
content: Caitlin Clark and the Indiana Fever will square off against Angel Reese and the Chicago Sky in prime time to tip off the inaugural WNBA Rivals Week in August.

title: No. 7 PG recruit Lewis decommits from Kentucky
content: Acaden Lewis, the No. 7-ranked point guard in the 2025 class, decommitted from Kentucky, he told ESPN on Thursday.

title: NFL draft prospect Bond surrenders on warrant
content: NFL draft prospect Isaiah Bond, 21, turned himself in on an outstanding sexual assault warrant Thursday morning, the Frisco (Texas) Police Department confirmed to ESPN.

title: WMU wins in 2OT, plays BU for Frozen Four title
content: Owen Michaels's double-overtime goal sent Western Michigan to the Frozen Four title game, where it will face Boston University on Saturday night.

title: 'Everybody in the organization was miserable': Inside the Nuggets' shocking dual firings
content: With less than a week left in the regular season, Denver fired its head coach and GM, ending a yearslong cold war, and risking the NBA's most precious commodity: the prime of three-time NBA MVP Nikola Jokic.

title: Mock draft: Who comes after No. 1 Paige Bueckers?
content: The No. 2 pick sees an international entry, while Hailey Van Lith and Sedona Prince drop out of the first round.

title: 'An ordinary guy': What's John Daly doing at the Hooters in Augusta?
content: Golf's everyman hero hasn't played the Masters since 2006, but every year he shows up in town to hang and sell merch.

title: With Flacco signing, Browns in position to forgo drafting QB at No. 2
content: With Flacco back in the fold, the Browns have a veteran quarterback on the roster whom they can trust to run the offense in 2025.

title: Power Rankings: Predictions for every team's 2025-26 contention status
content: From top Cup contenders to teams on the bubble to those still building, here's the "next year now" for all 32.

title: The Kid behind the camera: Best of Ken Griffey Jr.'s 2025 Masters photography
content: Baseball Hall of Famer Ken Griffey Jr. is roaming the greens of Augusta as a credentialed photographer.

title: Georgia, Florida and Miami among teams hitting the field
content: Spring games aren't as plentiful as they have been, but several big-name schools are in action this weekend.

title: Bayern, Dortmund cannot afford to lose
content: Saturday's Klassiker isn't first vs. second, but Bayern and Dortmund's seasons hinge on their rivalry match.

title: Salah signs two-year Liverpool contract extension
content: Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah has signed a contract extension, ending monthslong uncertainty over his future at Anfield, the club announced.

title: Slot: Salah's new Liverpool deal took huge 'effort'
content: Liverpool boss Arne Slot admitted on Friday that he knew for a while that Mohamed Salah's contract talks were heading in the "right direction."

title: Two fans die in Chile before Libertadores match
content: Two fans died on Thursday before the start of a Copa Libertadores match between Colo Colo and Fortaleza near Santiago's estadio Monumental.

title: Ronaldo launches film studio with famed filmmaker
content: Cristiano Ronaldo has joined forces with British filmmaker Matthew Vaughn to launch an independent film studio.

title: MLS won't switch to fall/spring schedule before '27
content: MLS has announced that the league will explore a switch to its schedule that would align with the international soccer calendar as early as 2027, as well as possible changes to the format of the regular season and playoffs

title: Amorim 'really confident' in Onana despite gaffes
content: Ruben Amorim says he remains "really confident" in André Onana despite the goalkeeper's two blunders costing Manchester United a crucial Europa League victory against Lyon on Wednesday.

title: USMNT, Mexico learn Gold Cup group opponents
content: The United States landed in Group D alongside Haiti, Trinidad and Tobago and Saudi Arabia in Thursday's Concacaf Gold Cup draw, while champions Mexico were placed into Group A with Costa Rica, Suriname, and Dominican Republic.

title: Star exits, coaching changes, lawsuits: After awful 2024, San Diego is rebounding
content: After a turbulent 2024 season on and off the field -- including the exit of Naomi Girma, the retirement of Alex Morgan and several coaching changes -- the new-look San Diego Wave are hoping for better times ahead.

title: From The Babe's home run handles to Bonds' maple mashers: A brief history of bats
content: The torpedo is the talk of 2025, but bat experiments have changed baseball and created controversy for 150 years.

title: Experts pick 10-man rosters from 2025 class: Who has the best superteam?
content: Mel Kiper Jr., Matt Miller, Jordan Reid and Field Yates drafted their own rosters of 2025 draft prospects. Check out all 40 picks -- and vote on the winner.

title: Ohio State's Will Howard believes he's the best QB in this NFL draft class
content: Howard says confidence in himself helped him face adversity, reach NFL draft class with 'unbelievable talent.'

title: Five years since Bahrain 2020: The tech that saved Grosjean's life
content: It's been five years since Romain Grosjean's fiery Bahrain crash. F1's ongoing search for safety saved him.

title: Monaco-inspired Long Beach is now a jewel in IndyCar's crown
content: IndyCar is living the dream of Monaco in Southern California as Long Beach celebrates 50 years of "the race."

title: After Salah's contract, where do Liverpool now need to improve?
content: Liverpool still have breathing room but have lost three times in four games in all competitions. What's going on? And how can they improve the squad in the summer?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Real Madrid spark EPL battle for $65m Huijsen
content: Dean Huijsen is set for a move to one of the Premier League's big clubs. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: US and China hurtling towards total breakdown of ties
content: Tensions escalate between the US and China as a tit-for-tat tariff war decimates their $600 billion trade. MAGA hardliners push for delisting Chinese companies, confiscating assets, and revoking student visas, while Beijing seeks international support against US tariffs. Experts warn Trump's approach may backfire, with some seeing the US as a global destabilizer amid weakening market confidence.

title: Record low! MS Dhoni's comeback marred by historic collapse
content: In a surprising turn of events, MS Dhoni's return as CSK captain in IPL 2025 saw the team slump to their lowest-ever score at Chepauk, managing only 103 for 9 against KKR. KKR's spinners exploited the pitch conditions, claiming six wickets and triggering a collapse. This total is the second-lowest ever recorded at the venue.

title: Next stop, Delhi? What’s ahead for K Annamalai as Tamil Nadu BJP gets new chief
content: As K. Annamalai steps down as Tamil Nadu BJP chief, speculation is rife about his next role. He might be appointed as a central minister in Delhi, given an organizational position within the BJP at the national level, or tasked with strengthening the party in Tamil Nadu. Amit Shah praised Annamalai's contributions, hinting at a significant future role.

title: Dust is in the air: Strong storm in Delhi-NCR, flights diverted
content: Delhi experienced a welcome temperature drop as dusty storms swept through the city for two consecutive days, causing some damage like fallen tree branches. The IMD had issued a yellow alert, forecasting fluctuating temperatures and the possibility of thunderstorms and lightning. While this offers temporary relief from the recent heatwave, temperatures are expected to rise again around April 15.

title: Jeff Bezos’ Mar-a-Lago dinner led to Melania’s $40M Amazon Prime project
content: Melania Trump has secured a $40 million deal with Amazon Prime Video for a documentary chronicling her White House life, directed by Brett Ratner. The film, slated for a mid-2025 release, will feature exclusive insights into her daily life, with appearances by Donald and Barron Trump.

title: Celebrity Masterchef winner: Gaurav Khanna lifts the trophy
content: Gaurav Khanna emerged as the winner of Celebrity Masterchef's first season after a three-month culinary battle. He impressed judges Farah Khan, Sanjeev Kapoor, and Ranveer Brar with his innovative dishes, securing the title and a Rs 20 lakh prize. Despite initial challenges and revealing his color blindness, Gaurav's determination and growth throughout the competition led to his victory.

title: 'Appreciate counter-terrorism cooperation': EAM on Rana's extradition from US
content: External affairs minister S Jaishankar lauded the counter-terrorism cooperation between India and the US following Tahawwur Rana's extradition, a key accused in the 26/11 Mumbai attacks. US Secretary of State Marco Rubio echoed this sentiment, emphasizing the pursuit of justice for the victims.

title: US: We will revoke or deny Visa if your social media posts are in support of ...
content: USCIS has officially declared that social media posts can now impact visa decisions. The agency will scrutinize accounts, potentially denying visas or residency to individuals posting content deemed anti-Semitic or supportive of designated terrorist groups like Hamas and Hezbollah. This policy, effective immediately, extends to student visas and Green Card applications, raising concerns about freedom of expression.

title: 'Squatted on track': Over 5,000 people obstruct train movement in Bengal
content: Train services in West Bengal's Azimganj-New Farakka section were disrupted on April 11, 2025, as approximately 5,000 people blocked the railway track between Dhulianganga and Nimtita stations. The obstruction, stemming from a non-railway cause, halted the Kamakhya-Puri Express and delayed the Barharwa Azimganj Passenger train.

title: Analyst on Intel CEO: Simple fact is that Mr Li-Bu Tan is unqualified to ....
content: Intel's CEO, Lip-Bu Tan, faces scrutiny due to his extensive investments in Chinese tech firms, including those with ties to the People's Liberation Army. This has sparked concerns among investors about potential conflicts of interest, especially given Intel's role in supplying chips to the US Department of Defense.

title: Rohit Sharma shouts 'abey mera kya le rha hai?' as dust storm interrupts practice
content: Mumbai Indians' IPL preparations in Delhi faced disruption due to sudden dusty storms, impacting their practice session ahead of their clash with Delhi Capitals. Rohit Sharma humorously reacted to the weather, as seen in a video shared by the team. The IMD issued a yellow alert for Delhi, forecasting temperatures between 23°C and 38°C.

title: Trump's war on academia: How US is driving out world's brightest minds
content: The Trump administration is facing backlash for its strict immigration policies. These policies target pro-Palestine voices in American universities. Visa cancellations and deportations are rising. Universities are under pressure to align with the administration's views. Federal funding is at risk for non-compliance. International students are now considering other countries for education. This situation is creating fear and silence on campuses.

title: Annamalai out, AIADMK in: How Nainar Nagendran as Tamil Nadu chief helps BJP
content: BJP and AIADMK have reunited for the 2026 Tamil Nadu assembly elections, with Amit Shah declaring the NDA will contest under Edappadi Palaniswami's leadership. Nainar Nagendran, formerly with AIADMK, is set to become the Tamil Nadu BJP state president, succeeding K Annamalai.

title: NYC chopper pilot radioed minutes before crashing into Hudson River
content: A New York Helicopter Tour tragically crashed into the Hudson River, killing all six on board, including Siemens executive Agustin Escobar's family. The pilot, en route for refuelling, reported needing fuel shortly before the crash. CEO Michael Roth expressed devastation, noting the main rotor blades detached, speculating a possible bird strike or mechanical failure.

title: US military base chief in Greenland fired for 'undermining' JD Vance
content: The commander of Pituffik Space Base in Greenland, Col. Susan Meyers, was relieved of her duties after expressing disagreement with Vice President JD Vance's remarks during his controversial visit. Meyers' email to base personnel stated that Vance's concerns did not align with the base leadership's views. 'I commit that, for as long as I am lucky enough to lead this base, all of our flags will fly proudly -- together,' Meyers wrote in her email.

title: Happy Hanuman Jayanti 2025: Top 50 wishes, messages, quotes and images
content: Hanuman Jayanti, celebrating Lord Hanuman's birth on April 12, 2025, is a day for prayers, fasting, and reading the Hanuman Chalisa. Devotees seek blessings for strength and protection through bhajans and kirtans. Share heartfelt wishes, messages, and quotes with loved ones to enhance this auspicious occasion, fostering positivity and devotion among family, friends, and colleagues.

title: 'Nitish be made deputy PM': Is BJP planning JD(U) supremo's 'honourable exit'?
content: Speculation is growing within Bihar's NDA alliance as the BJP may be considering a significant shift in leadership post-elections. The BJP might propose an "honourable exit" for Nitish Kumar, potentially relocating him to a central cabinet position or another constitutional role.

title: DMK takes 'fell at BJP's feet' dig at Palaniswami as AIADMK reunites with NDA
content: The DMK has criticized the AIADMK's reunion with the BJP, claiming it was driven by fear and pressure on Edappadi K Palaniswami. According to DMK, Palaniswami ultimately yielded to the BJP's influence. DMK also believes actor Vijay's new party will split opposition votes, benefiting them in the upcoming elections. Amit Shah announced the AIADMK's return to the NDA without preconditions.

title: AIADMK, BJP announce alliance for Tamil Nadu assembly elections
content: The AIADMK and BJP have officially announced their alliance for the 2026 Tamil Nadu assembly elections during a joint press conference. Amit Shah confirmed Edappadi K Palaniswami will lead the NDA in the state. Shah dismissed reports of AIADMK's demands, emphasizing the alliance's long-standing history and its permanent nature, highlighting PM Modi and Jayalalithaa's past collaboration.

title: Will Paul Skenes play tonight against Cincinnati Reds?
content: The Pittsburgh Pirates and Cincinnati Reds are set for an exciting match at Great American Ball Park on April 11, 2025. While Paul Skenes, fresh from a commendable outing against the St. Louis Cardinals, will be seen in action against their arch-rivals.

title: MS Dhoni calls his longtime teammate a 'traitor'
content: Chennai Super Kings face a setback as Ruturaj Gaikwad's elbow injury sidelines him for the remainder of the IPL season. MS Dhoni will reclaim captaincy, confirmed by coach Stephen Fleming. Ahead of the KKR clash, Dhoni and former teammate Dwayne Bravo shared a light moment. Dhoni, who captained CSK from 2008 to 2023 and led them to five IPL titles, had handed over the reins to Gaikwad ahead of the 2024 season.

title: Why is Ruturaj Gaikwad not playing CSK vs KKR match?
content: Chennai Super Kings faces a blow as Ruturaj Gaikwad is out of IPL 2025 due to an elbow fracture sustained during a match against Rajasthan Royals. Stephen Fleming confirmed MS Dhoni will reclaim captaincy. Dhoni included Rahul Tripathi and Anshul Kamboj in the playing XI. Dhoni emphasized the importance of winning and focusing on the basics after losing several matches.

title: Barbie box trend: How to turn your photos into AI doll avatars using ChatGPT
content: The Barbie box trend has exploded on social media, enabling users to transform their photos into AI-generated action figures or dolls encased in personalized toy boxes. This Barbiecore-inspired trend allows for custom accessories and packaging, creating collectible avatars.

title: Agustin Escobar, family boarded doomed NYC copter to celebrate kid's birthday: Report
content: Agustin Escober, a Siemens executive, his wife, and their three children tragically died in a helicopter crash in the Hudson River during a celebratory tour of New York City. The helicopter, operated by a company with a history of safety incidents, crashed shortly after reporting the need for fuel. The incident is under investigation.

title: Captain Dhoni breaks another IPL record to become ...
content: MS Dhoni is back as captain for Chennai Super Kings. He replaces Ruturaj Gaikwad due to injury. Dhoni is now the oldest captain in IPL history. The announcement was made before the match against Kolkata Knight Riders. Dhoni emphasized focusing on the basics. Stephen Fleming expressed faith in Dhoni's leadership. Fans are excited about Dhoni leading the team again.

title: 'India-US could finalise partial bilateral trade deal amid 90-day tariff truce'
content: India and the US are working towards finalizing a portion of their Bilateral Trade Agreement during the 90-day tariff pause initiated by the US. Negotiations have commenced, with both nations aiming for a mutually beneficial outcome. India is actively engaged, seeking to finalize initial phases by September-October, targeting a significant increase in bilateral trade to $500 billion by 2030.

title: Grey's Anatomy star Eric Dane diagnosed with a rare disease that impairs nervous system
content: Eric Dane, known as "McSteamy" from Grey's Anatomy, has been diagnosed with ALS, a progressive neurological disorder. Despite this challenging diagnosis, the 51-year-old actor remains determined to continue working, including his role in Euphoria Season 3. Dane's resilience and openness are inspiring others and highlighting the need for increased ALS awareness and research funding.

title: MS Dhoni gives major update on Ruturaj Gaikwad, reveals ...
content: In an electrifying atmosphere at Chepauk, Kolkata Knight Riders won the toss and opted to field against Chennai Super Kings. A significant blow for CSK as Ruturaj Gaikwad is ruled out of the tournament due to injury, with MS Dhoni taking over the captaincy. Amid the thunderous cheers and electrifying atmosphere, Dhoni shared a major update on Ruturaj Gaikwad.

title: New York Yankees vs San Francisco Giants —Where and how to watch today’s match
content: The New York Yankees are hosting the San Francisco Giants for a three-game series at the Yankee Stadium in the Bronx at 7:05 p.m. ET. The game between the Yankees and the Giants can be streamed on YES and NBCS-BA, which are the official streaming platforms for the New York Yankees and San Francisco Giants.

title: Indian Consulate in Melbourne vandalised with graffiti on main entrance
content: The Indian Consulate General in Melbourne was vandalized with graffiti at its St Kilda Road location. The incident, occurring around 1:00 am on April 10, prompted a response from Victoria Police.

title: 'Indians deserved it': What Rana allegedly told Headley after 26/11 attack
content: Tahawwur Hussain Rana, the 64-year-old Canadian of Pakistani origin, was extradited from the US to India to face trial for his role in the 2008 Mumbai attacks, which killed 166 people. Accused of aiding co-conspirator David Headley, Rana allegedly praised the attackers. His extradition, after a lengthy legal battle, is hailed as a major step in securing justice for the victims.

title: Exclusive: RCB fan who became a world champion
content: Pranav Venkatesh, the World Junior Chess Champion, has his sights set on becoming the World Chess Champion. The 18-year-old from Chennai balances chess with academics and enjoys cricket. He admires Magnus Carlsen and Viswanathan Anand. Pranav is preparing for upcoming tournaments in Spain and Dubai. He skipped his board exams for the championship.

title: 'Will leverage Annamalai's organisational skills in national framework': Shah
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah lauded K. Annamalai for his exceptional contributions as the Tamil Nadu BJP unit chief, highlighting his efforts in promoting party policies and programs. Shah announced that the BJP would utilize Annamalai's organizational skills at the national level.

title: Amit Shah says AIADMK made 'no demand' as party reunites with BJP-led NDA
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah announced the AIADMK's return to the NDA for the upcoming Tamil Nadu assembly election, stating that the AIADMK had no preconditions for re-joining. Shah emphasized that the BJP would not interfere in AIADMK's internal affairs and that the election would be contested under Edapaddi K Palaniswami's leadership.

title: Here's why KL Rahul did 'mera ground hai' celebration vs RCB
content: KL Rahul's magnificent unbeaten 93 propelled Delhi Capitals to a six-wicket victory over Royal Challengers Bengaluru at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium on Thursday. Rahul's match-winning knock, combined with his intimate knowledge of the ground, guided his team to victory. He celebrated with a gesture inspired by the movie Kantara, declaring the stadium as his home turf.

title: Mumbai to Dubai in 2 hours? All about rail project connecting India to UAE
content: An ambitious proposal envisions a high-speed underwater train connecting Mumbai and Dubai, potentially slashing travel time to two hours. Spearheaded by the UAE's National Advisor Bureau Limited, the 2,000-kilometer subsea rail corridor aims to revolutionize transcontinental travel. Beyond passenger transport, it plans to facilitate goods movement, strengthening trade relations and setting a precedent for future global transportation projects.

title: Social worker assaulted, held 'hostage' by IRCTC pantry staff on Gitanjali Express
content: Passengers on the Gitanjali Express faced consequences for complaining about the food quality and price. IRCTC staffers allegedly assaulted passengers, holding a social worker hostage for over an hour until RPF intervened. Satyajit Burman, the social worker, filed a complaint, leading to a case against seven IRCTC employees.

title: Musk says Starship will reach Mars by 2026 with Optimus robots onboard
content: Elon Musk revealed his plan to send Tesla's Optimus robots to Mars. SpaceX's Starship rocket will carry the robots. The mission aims to prepare Mars for human habitation. Experts are skeptical about the 2026 timeline. Government support could help advance the Mars mission. This mission marks a significant step in space exploration.

title: Burqa-clad woman stopped from speaking to man from other community in B'luru
content: In Bengaluru's Chandra Layout, police arrested four individuals for moral policing. A woman, wearing a Burqa, was confronted by community members for speaking with a man from a different community while on a scooter. The woman filed a complaint, leading to the arrests, including a juvenile. Authorities confirmed that no violence occurred during the incident. An investigation is currently underway.

title: IMA condemns attacks on hospitals following pregnant woman’s death in Pune
content: The IMA has strongly condemned certain “irresponsible” public statements made by political leaders in the aftermath of the incident

title: Protests over Waqf Act continue in West Bengal
content: Amid violent protest over the Waqf (Amendment) Act, West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee has assured the members of the minority community that she will protect their rights and land and asked them not to be “restless”

title: Special court takes cognizance of offence against CM’s daughter, others in CMRL pay-off case
content: Additional District and Sessions Judge 7, Ernakulam, ordered summons to be issued against Veena Thaikandiyil and others.  The accused will have to personally appear before court on a scheduled date and apply for bail. While Veena has been arraigned as 11th accused, her now-defunct IT firm, Exalogic Solutions Private Limited, Karnataka, is the 12th accused

title: SAARC Development Fund should do more work, experts say amid USAID cuts
content: Diplomatic sources and experts are suggesting that the SAARC Development Fund should broaden its focus and bring in infrastructure and connectivity projects under its ambit

title: ‘Vruthi’ seeks to allay public concern on waste management plants
content: Participants of national conclave taken to the sewage treatment plant at Muttathara, managed by the Thiruvananthapuram Corporation, which is functioning without problems raised by the local population

title: Turmeric-added milk may soon be served to passengers in flights and trains
content: National Turmeric Board is preparing to launch ‘Golden Milk’ project, says its Chairman Ganga Reddy; he advises farmers in Andhra Pradesh to cultivate high-curcumin turmeric varieties to enhance profits

title: MBA fiasco: Lok Ayukta comes flays Kerala University for mishandling answer sheets
content: Directs university to award average marks to a student, based on her academic record and results in other examinations

title: Protesting teachers meet Bengal Education Minister Bratya Basu
content: Mr. Basu said the West Bengal School Service Commission is ready to publish a list of tainted and untainted candidates; teachers sayd they will continue protests till the list is published

title: Trinamool leader and former West Bengal Minister Abdur Rezzak Mollah passes away
content: Once with the CPI(M), Mollah, an agricultural leader, had openly criticised Left Front govt. for the land acquisition at Singur and Nandigram

title: Health dept. issues alert on chikungunya
content: Alert prompted by an epidemic ‘medium-intensity’ in Reunion Islands in the eastern coast of Africa. The first chikungunya outbreak in Kerala in 2006-07 had been an extension of the outbreak in these islands

title: Alappuzha Collector submits Vembanad rejuvenation plan to Chief Minister
content: Document includes summary of activities organised in the district under the aegis of district administration and local self-government bodies, along with recommendations submitted by expert committees for rejuvenation of lake

title: Junior doctors at Siddhartha govt. college complain of ragging; inquiry ordered
content: They alleged that some seniors and interns were ill-treating and using abusive language against them in the hostel

title: Unified health coverage scheme rolled out in Odisha
content: The scheme which combines Ayushman Bharat and ‘Gopabandhu Jan Arogya Yojana’ will cover 1.03 crore families (3.46 crore population) of Odisha

title: ‘Sita Rama Kalyanam’ turns out to be a visual delight for the devout at Vontimitta in Andhra Pradesh
content: Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu, accompanied by his wife Bhuvaneswari, offers ‘silk vastrams’ to the deities ahead of the celestial wedding; TTD, which manages the temple, makes arrangements on an unprecedented scale

title: Six-year-old boy drowned in pond after resisting sexual assault attempt; accused held
content: The accused joined local residents who were searching for the missing child, pretending to be part of the search effort

title: Finally, Cabinet accepts census report; discussion at next meeting
content: A discussion is slated for the next Cabinet meeting, as some Ministers wanted to study the report and the recommendations

title: CPI(M) will create a cultural wall of resistance against RSS bid to stifle artistic freedom and political dissent: Govindan
content: CPI(M) State secretary says RSS is attempting to undermine the secular and liberal foundations of the Constitution

title: Developed world more reliable trading partner than China, says Piyush Goyal
content: Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal indicated that India would be better positioned to work with developed countries with “mutual trust and mutual benefit”

title: School exam success rate: Concern over dip in Assam, jump in Meghalaya
content: Meghalaya’s high pass rate is criticised for potentially compromising education quality, while Assam’s drop in pass rate is seen as a failure of the government

title: CPI(M) criticises ex-CM Biplab Deb over his temple theft statement
content: Mr. Deb had claimed that the “CPI(M) had in the past sold out the gold jewellery of the Tripura Sundari Temple and replaced them with fakes”; the former CM provided no evidence for this allegation

title: Yellow Line of Namma Metro likely to begin limited operations by June
content: The 19.15 km Yellow Line, stretching from R.V. Road to Bommasandra, has been structurally complete for several months. However, its launch has been delayed primarily due to the late arrival of driverless metro trains.

title: Dalit youth stripped, beaten in public view in Chhattisgarh for alleged relationship with OBC girl
content: The 21-year-old victim was caught while visiting a 16-year-old girl, beaten and tortured by her family, subjected to casteist slurs, and filmed; police take suo motu cognisance of videos, arrest six accused

title: Stand-off between Kerala High Court lawyers and judges turns bitter
content: In a letter, Kerala High Court Advocates’ Association asks judges “not to meddle with the affairs of the association.” This follows an April 9 order against the association for resorting to boycott of the court.

title: HYDRAA signs MoU with NRSC towards making land/lake data accessible to people
content: The MoU inked by HYDRAA Commissioner A.V. Ranganath and National Remote Sensing Centre Director Prakash Chauhan also aims to facilitate a comprehensive exercise of collecting and compiling data on stormwater drains and parks

title: Palayam market redevelopment caught in a stalemate
content: A good number of traders have refused to move to the rehabilitation block nearby citing, among other issues, unhygienic conditions and lack of proper ventilation at the facility

title: Naidu government boosts girls education in Parvatipuram with new hostel
content: New hostel coming up under PM-USHA scheme aims to reduce dropout rate among girls in tribal areas, says TDP MLA Bonela Vijayachandra

title: SFI, KSU activists, 200 others booked for clashes during Kerala University elections
content: V-C seeks detailed report on the election and resultant confrontation between the rival groups during vote counting

title: Tension over midnight brawl between lawyers, students spills over
content: Bar Association and SFI blame each other for the alleged brawl during the Ernakulam Bar Association’s annual day celebrations at the district court complex in Kochi on April 10, 2025

title: Prashant Kishor gives clarion call to uproot ‘Lalu-Nitish-Modi regime’
content: In the party’s first show of strength rally ahead of the Bihar Assembly elections due later this year, the Jan Suraaj Party founder alleges that Chief Minister Nitish Kumar’s administration prevented his supporters from reaching the rally venue

title: Shops at GCDA’s new market at Kaloor to be tendered shortly
content: Of the total 82 shops, 15 will be allotted to traders who operated before the market renovation, while 27 will be reserved for rehabilitating traders from the old market near Deshabhimani Junction

title: Ahead of the 2026 Assembly polls, CPI(M) flags replication of vilification campaign against CM and family
content: In 2021, it was the gold smuggling case. Now, it is the SFIO case against Mr. Vijayan’s daughter and software entrepreneur, Veena Thaikkandiyil. The gold case came to nought, and the accusations against Mr. Vijayan vanished like a wisp of smoke. The LDF came back to power for a second consecutive time. History is set to repeat itself in 2026

title: Delegation visits Belagavi for revolutionising waste management infrastructure
content: Mayor Mangesh Pawar and Deputy Mayor Vani Vilas Joshi welcome the team of 14 national and international stakeholders

title: Congress to be strengthened up to ‘booth level’, says Baghel
content: Mr. Bhagel, who is in Punjab on a two-day visit, held a series of meetings with the party leaders, including one with the District Congress Committee (DCC) president and another meeting of the Political Affairs Committee.

title: CM defends Vellappally amid controversy over Malappuram remark
content: Pinarayi Vijayan praises SNDP Yogam general secretary Vellappally Natesan for consistently upholding a secular stance, says his statements were recently twisted by a political party.

title: Will not tolerate character assassination on social media: Naidu
content: Those who spread misinformation or speak irresponsibly will face consequences, I will act like a fierce protector, uncompromising with those who violate norms, says CM

title: DRDO conducts release trials of Long-Range Glide Bomb ‘Gaurav’ from Su-30 MKI
content: A statement says during the trials, the weapon 0was integrated to multiple stations in different warhead configurations, with land target on Island, adding that the trials successfully demonstrated range close to 100 kms with pin-point accuracy

title: Contractors themselves will topple Congress govt., says Somanna
content: The Minister recalls their allegation of corruption against the previous BJP regime and says that they are now targeting their ‘own govt.’

title: Summer showers raise hopes of Idukki cardamom farmers
content: Major cardamom-growing areas have received four spells of summer rain. Officials at ICAR-KVK say farmers can start fertilizer application on the plants

title: Tri-commissionerate records over 4.3 lakh wrong-side driving violations in first quarter
content: Hyderabad traffic police begins mapping hotspots for ANPR camera installation aiming to automate challans and analyse the u-turns and road infrastructure to improve safety

title: Mbappé lawyers have court seize €55m from PSG
content: the french striker argues he owes him €55 million ($61m) in unpaid wages . his lawyers claim they have asked the court to start proceedings . a legal hearing is scheduled for may 26 .

title: "Big Step In Justice For 26/11 Victims": S Jaishankar On Tahawwur Rana Extradition
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar responded to US Secretary of State Marco Rubio's comments on the extradition of 26/11 Mumbai terror attacks plotter Tahawwur Hussain Rana, calling the development "a big step".

title: "He Is Still...": Amit Shah On K Annamalai 'Being Removed' For AIADMK Alliance
content: Refusing to be drawn into the speculation surrounding K Annamalai's removal as the Tamil Nadu president of the BJP, Union Home Minister and senior party leader Amit Shah has said Mr Annamalai still holds the post.

title: "Won't Negotiate At Gunpoint": Piyush Goyal, S Jaishankar Double Down On US
content: India will never negotiate at gunpoint, nor will it hurry into a deal over issues that are in the interest of its people, Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal said after Donald Trump's move to "pause" the reciprocal tariffs Washington imposed on New Delhi.

title: 15 Flights Diverted, Several Delayed As Dust Storm Hits Delhi, Nearby Areas
content: After days of scorching heat, the national capital and its adjoining areas have been witnessing a change in weather.

title: Woman Friend In Washroom, 38-Year-Old Techie Dies By Suicide At Noida Hotel
content: A software engineer was found dead in a hotel room in Uttar Pradesh's Noida last night. Umesh Kumar allegedly died by suicide while his woman friend with whom he was staying at the hotel was in the washroom.

title: AIADMK And BJP Team Up Again For Tamil Nadu Polls Under EPS' Leadership
content: Tamil Nadu's opposition party AIADMK and the BJP will contest the state elections together under the leadership of former chief minister Edappadi K Palaniswami, Union Home Minister Amit Shah said today at a joint press conference in Chennai.

title: IPL LIVE: CSK Slump To Lowest-Ever Total At Home; KKR Cruise In Chase
content: Chennai Super Kings vs Kolkata Knight Riders LIVE Score, IPL 2025: Sunil Narine and Ajinkya Rahane are leading KKR to victory after MS Dhoni-led CSK registered heir lowest-ever total at home.

title: Video: Small Plane Crashes Near Highway, Rail Tracks In US' Florida
content: A small plane crashed Friday morning in South Florida near a major interstate highway and railroad tracks, police said.

title: Over 6,000 Living Immigrants Listed Dead In The US To Force Self-Deportation
content: The Trump administration has taken a drastic step by classifying over 6,000 living immigrants as deceased, effectively cancelling their social security numbers and rendering them unable to work or access benefits.

title: Stock Markets, Tariff War With China: Trump Dominates This Week's Headlines
content: High drama on stock markets and tensions with China mixed with lighter fare for Donald Trump this week as he again dominated the news agenda for seven days.

title: Child Dangles In Air, Waiting For Rescue After Fire At Ahmedabad High Rise
content: A fire broke out on the fourth floor of an apartment complex in Gujarat's Ahmedabad. At least seven fire engines were present for relief operations, and the situation was brought under control.

title: World's Highest Bridge In China: Cuts Travel Time From 1 Hour To 1 Minute
